paragraphs: The Bowl of Compassion e.V. is 100% financed by voluntary donations. We receive about 70% of our donations on a regular basis via standing orders or direct-debit mandates.
The second pillar of our financing are donations made by companies or social institutions, transfering money generated from Charity Events as single donations to us.
Our administrative costs are well below 10%, as so far all our participating representatives receive very low expense allowances and partially also bear the costs themselves.
We confirm that we deal with donations we are entrusted with conscientiously, to achieve the greatest possible effect with the available resources!
